name: Golden Triangle Tour with Kerala
description:
Come and get enchanted with a land of vibrant colours, lavish palaces, majestic forts, eclectic streets, emerald backwaters and a lot more. For when you go to places like Jaipur that reflects the grandiose of erstwhile kings, visit the ghost city of Fatehpur Sikri which echoes the greatness of a bygone era, or take a rustic house boat cruise on the emerald backwaters of the Venice of East, you feel like you have stepped into a fairy land indeed.

Our tour package offers this and a whole lot more. Explore the ravishing sights of New and Old Delhi, tour through resplendent Agra where the towering symbol of love Taj Mahal resides, stroll through the quaint streets of Fort Kochi and tour through the elaborately adorned Amber Fort.
